p: The clinical characteristics of the 13 patients are presented in Table I. The NC group consisted of six patients including three men and three women with a mean age of 38.17±7.70 years. The OA group consisted of seven patients including three women and three men with a mean age of 71.71±6.02. A significant difference was identified between the ages of the two groups (P=0.001). There were no significant differences between the two groups regarding sex, BMI and limb side (P=0.817, 0.389 and 0.751, respectively).
